name: ListEsimProfile
description: Retrieve a list of eSIM Profiles.

Eid.description: List the eSIM Profiles that have been associated with an EId.

SimSid.description: Find the eSIM Profile resource related to a [Sim](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iot/supersim/api/sim-resource) resource by providing the SIM SID. Will always return an array with either 1 or 0 records.

Status.description: List the eSIM Profiles that are in a given status.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
